title: Croatia : Number of road deaths 2006 to 2018
summary: Overall Number of fatalities has increased over the Year.
Number of fatalities is slightly increasing from 2014 to 2015, slightly decreasing from 2015 to 2016, and finally roughly constant from 2016 to 2018.
The steepest decrease occurs in between the Year 2015 and 2016.
Maximum Number of fatalities, about 348.0 was reported at Year 2015
The lowest Number of fatalities, of value 307.0 was reported at Year 2016
